GSD.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v5.10.153
GSD.description:
net/mlx5: Fix possible use-after-free in async command interface

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.153 by commit bbcc06933f35651294ea1e963757502312c2171f, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit e355477ed9e4f401e3931043df97325d38552d54. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net/mlx5: Fix possible use-after-free in async command interface
